changeSet.author: liquibase (generated)
changeSet.createView: WITH final AS ( SELECT dim_review.review_id, dim_review.number_of_reviews, dim_review.last_review, dim_review.reviews_per_month FROM sch_bronze_airbnb.dim_review ) SELECT final.review_id, final.number_of_reviews, final.last_review, final.reviews_per_month FROM final;

changeSet.createView: WITH final AS ( SELECT dim_neighborhood.neighborhood_id, dim_neighborhood.neighbourhood_group, dim_neighborhood.neighbourhood_name FROM sch_bronze_airbnb.dim_neighborhood ) SELECT final.neighborhood_id, final.neighbourhood_group, final.neighbourhood_name FROM final;

changeSet.createView: WITH final AS ( SELECT dim_room_type.room_type_id, dim_room_type.room_type_name FROM sch_bronze_airbnb.dim_room_type ) SELECT final.room_type_id, final.room_type_name FROM final;

changeSet.createView: WITH final AS ( SELECT dim_host.host_id, dim_host.host_name, dim_host.host_calculated_listings_count FROM sch_bronze_airbnb.dim_host ) SELECT final.host_id, final.host_name, final.host_calculated_listings_count FROM final;

changeSet.author: liquibase (generated)
changeSet.createView: WITH final AS ( SELECT fct_home.home_id, fct_home.home_name, fct_home.home_latitude, fct_home.home_longitude, fct_home.home_price, fct_home.home_minimum_nights, fct_home.home_availability_365, fct_home.fk_neighborhood_id, fct_home.fk_host_id, fct_home.fk_review_id, fct_home.fk_room_type_id FROM sch_bronze_airbnb.fct_home ) SELECT final.home_id, final.home_name, final.home_latitude, final.home_longitude, final.home_price, final.home_minimum_nights, final.home_availability_365, final.fk_neighborhood_id, final.fk_host_id, final.fk_review_id, final.fk_room_type_id FROM final;

changeSet.author: liquibase (generated)
changeSet.createView: WITH fct_home_cte AS ( SELECT silver_fct_home.home_id, silver_fct_home.fk_review_id, silver_fct_home.fk_neighborhood_id FROM sch_silver_airbnb.silver_fct_home ), dim_review_cte AS ( SELECT silver_dim_review.review_id, silver_dim_review.number_of_reviews, silver_dim_review.last_review, silver_dim_review.reviews_per_month FROM sch_silver_airbnb.silver_dim_review ), dim_neighborhood_cte AS ( SELECT silver_dim_neighborhood.neighborhood_id, silver_dim_neighborhood.neighbourhood_group, silver_dim_neighborhood.neighbourhood_name FROM sch_silver_airbnb.silver_dim_neighborhood ), final AS ( SELECT dim_neighborhood_cte.neighbourhood_group, dim_neighborhood_cte.neighbourhood_name, to_char((dim_review_cte.last_review)::timestamp with time zone, 'Month'::text) AS booking_month, sum(dim_review_cte.reviews_per_month) AS total_booking FROM ((fct_home_cte JOIN dim_neighborhood_cte ON ((fct_home_cte.fk_neighborhood_id = dim_neighborhood_cte.neighborhood_id))) JOIN dim_review_cte ON ((fct_home_cte.fk_review_id = dim_review_cte.review_id))) GROUP BY dim_neighborhood_cte.neighbourhood_group, dim_neighborhood_cte.neighbourhood_name, (to_char((dim_review_cte.last_review)::timestamp with time zone, 'Month'::text)) ) SELECT final.neighbourhood_group, final.neighbourhood_name, final.booking_month, final.total_booking FROM final;
